# Sách

[![](watkins_efa_2021.jpg){ height=100px }](http://book.thuviencanhan.com/ref/factor_analysis/watkins_efa_2021.pdf) 
[![](brown_confirmatory_2015.png){ height=100px }](http://book.thuviencanhan.com/ref/factor_analysis/brown_confirmatory_2015.pdf)
[![](broc_sem_lavaan_2019.jpg){ height=100px }](http://book.thuviencanhan.com/ref/factor_analysis/broc_sem_lavaan_2019.pdf)

Watkins, Marley W. 2021. A Step-by-Step Guide to Exploratory Factor Analysis with R and RStudio. Routledge. [@watkins_efa_2021]

Brown, Timothy A. 2015. Confirmatory Factor Analysis for Applied Research. 2nd ed. Guilford Press. [@brown_confirmatory_2015]  

Gana, Kamel, and Guillaume Broc. 2019. Structural Equation Modeling with Lavaan. Willey. [@broc_sem_lavaan_2019]

# Tài liệu theo package

Package [`piecewiseSEM`](https://jslefche.github.io/piecewiseSEM/) [Book](https://jslefche.github.io/sem_book/index.html)

Package [`lavaangui`](https://github.com/karchjd/lavaangui) giúp vẽ sơ đồ SEM [Paper](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/10705511.2024.2420678)

Package [`lavaan`](https://lavaan.ugent.be/resources/books.html)

## Phân tích Mediation | Simple model

Hamid, Abdalla A. R. M., Abdullah Seif Abdullah Al Miskry, and Abdel Hameed M. Darweesh. 2023. "The Relationship Between Coping and Distress Among Faculty Members and Students During COVID-19 Pandemic Lockdown: The Moderating Effect of Gender." [@hamid_2023]

::: {.callout-tip title="@hamid_2023" collapse="true"}
![The model of the moderating effect of gender on the relationship
between coping and distress.](m1.png){ width=70% }

Quy trình phân tích mediation với biến `GENDER`
:::
